Articles.Content:
Greetings, everyone.

I happen to come by a second display screen to have fun with and now I'm looking forward in playing KSP with two displays. Is it possible? What it takes to have one display for different indicators (orbit parameters, app launcher, toolbars, etc) and the second one just for flying scene?

Stock: No!

Mod: Probably. Search the forum for 'telemachus'. It can be used to display KSP info on a second or third screen. This might be what you're looking for.

Edited November 17, 2016 by Tex_NL

I have a dual screen setup.  I only use one screen to play on.  The other is open on the forums or the Launch Window Planner website, or the KSP Wiki.

Happy landings!
